name: Room Wall Noooooo!!
description:
A 2D Top down shooting game which u can only force enemy backwards to stop the walls move towards you! You'll be clamp by them if you owned a pair of stupid hands!

But the while, it's still looks ugly since i've no times to polish it, i only took about 12 hours to make it :(

Presented by: Tan Kok Liang

Tools:
Art - Asesprite
Music - Bosca Ceoil v2
Sfx - Bfxr
